db:info.db:title: Using List Models as Data Sources in QML

db:abstract.db:para: Implements an F1 Legends Chart to demonstrate List Models as Data Sources.

db:note.db:para: This is part of the Charts with QML Gallery example.

db:article.db:para: Let's define an empty ChartView first:
db:article.db:programlisting: ChartView { id: chartView title: "Driver Speeds, lap 1" anchors.fill: parent legend.alignment: Qt.AlignTop animationOptions: ChartView.SeriesAnimations antialiasing: true }
db:article.db:para: Our ListModel uses hard-coded test data. In a real application the data source would be a timing system.
The data is parsed with a timer. The line series representing each driver are created on the fly.
